titleStmt.title: Men are gods, or, The dignity of magistracy, and the duty of the magistrate as it was presented in a sermon at the assize holden at Hertford for that county on August 2, 1653 / by George Swinnocke ...
titleStmt.author: Swinnock, George, 1627-1673.
Hall, Thomas, 1610-1665. Beauty of magistracy.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R.W. for Nevil Simmons ...,

notesStmt.note: Appears in Thomas Hall's The beauty of the magistry. London : 1660.
